summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5516 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 26, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between 10th Avenue North and 11th Avenue North, from Shelby Street to Hamlin Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 70597, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
